availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert B. Neville (Hickman and Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Hickman and Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Clarissa Jane Berry Neville. Father of Elizabeth Ann Neville, William N. Neville, George W. Neville, James T. Neville, John Christopher Neville, and Ida Francis Neville. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 13B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Milburn District, p. 630.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 8, p. 503A-B.
Charles Kerr, William Elsley Connelly, and E.M. Coulter, eds., History of Kentucky, vol. 5 (Chicago: The American Historical Society, 1922): p. 513.
